post.body: yes he is
Huck Finn is one of my faves as well
What kind of pizza do you want this week?
Can't send him home. Kim's setting up for her office Christmas party today. Pick up at 4 pm. Short day for full pay!
Has K eaten anything lately? It would probably help. But I'll pray too : )
thanks for leaving those brownies at my house. They were sooo yummy!
Can you help me with a computer project tonite?
came over just as I was sneaking Fritos from the pantry....caught me red handed. Serves me right
Your medication is at my house if you want to pick it up - I'll be home all day
Would it be too much to ask you to bring enchiladas or some other type of casserole? Do you have stuff to make it?
Sounds yummy. Umm...what is it?
Have we had this conversation already?
If so, so sorry. My brain is a little tired
Just curious what you are planning on bringing to the Fiesta tomorrow nite.
the parents have arrived...come on over!
I'm a little outraged at this attitude...no soup for you!!
Ha ha Yes he was..turned the tv on and he got over it real quick : )
doesn't matter where. Just out
Could you add a bag of sugar to the list? I'm out. Sigh...
I just sent you a list for Fred Meyer
Drive carefully!
Yeah, I know. Should have been making cookies
because Breaking Dawn was that good or that bad?
"Let's give thanks to the Lord above, cuz Santa is comin tonight" No wonder society is confused
All the kiddos went home early today. I'm free! FREE! Let the weekend begin!!
Oh, and add two stinky diapers to that
Dakota has thrown 7 tantrums, hit Trevor 3 times, and been put in time-out twice. And its not even 10 am. Gonna be a looong day.
Spence missed CDT choir tonite. He's in tears.
Good morning at MOPS. Need a nap. Not going to get one.
Just caught the cat drinking water out of the fish tank - yummy : (-
Wrapping Christmas presents. Fa la la la la, la la la la
Just finished giving the boys haircuts & baths. Now to sweep up
Good morning world! We're having a beautiful sunrise today!
Shopped for 5 hours today. Huge headache. Proof I'm allergic to shopping
It's warmed up to 13 degrees...think I'll send the boys outside for a bit. Gotta take advantage of today's high temp!
Having the best Snow Day EVER!!
Just pulled Spencer's loose tooth out! I bribed him with 2 cookies to let me touch it...hee hee
I've got cabin fever. Haven't left the house since Sunday.
Whoo Hoo! It snowed a ton last night!
Got lost in Stephanie Meyer's "The Host." Great story - very complex
